column4: Hey, my internet (wifi) is really unstable, its connected but I can't load web pages and takes forever to connect to IRC. What can I do?
do you know your network interface's name?
- hm, maybe there is some proxy setting in your browser?
that's what might cause the problem - just check it...
no proxy, direct connection to internet in firefox
I just re-did it and worked second time, nmap installed, what do I do now?
that sounds odd again - one time working - next time not
I would have wanted to check whether the connection doesn't even initialize or if the connection just doesnt transfer data
Can the problem be from my router itself?
of course it could be not correctly routing your requests - even more so because it does NAT too but to test that you would need another pc
